page.title: 16Feelings of Local People
page.content: Parents living in and around Coddenham and Hemingstone hope their children benefit greatly from living in the country. There could be a lack of independence for young people but in general the teenagers appreciate country life. Most folk born and bred in this area and those who have come to it and lived here for many years can conceive of no other way of life and are grateful to be able to live in such an unspoilt area. They are sad however that often large lorries using the minor roads in this block are a worry and a danger to pedestrians and in addition, vibrations can undermine the structure of the older houses, resulting in each individual having to protect his own environment; if people feel strongly on certain issues, they can organise protests through the Parish Council first.
